knowledges.title: About teacher.
knowledges.content:
A teacher is an individual who helps others to learn. A teacher often works in a 
classroom.

knowledges.title: Teachers way of teaching.
knowledges.content:
There are different ways of teaching. Initially teachers used chalk to write on the black board but 
today teachers are using marker pens to write on the white boards. Teachers often explain new 
concept, and help students with their work.

knowledges.title: Teacher bond with student.
knowledges.content:
A school teacher is person who is trained to educate childrens. The teachers form strong 
relationships with their students. The teachers teach them life lessons making them good human.

knowledges.title: Qualities of teachers.
knowledges.content:
The top five qualities of a teacher are:
Care
Patience
Good knowledge
Dedication 
understanding
